name: Swept Ashore 2.0.1
description:
Completely overhauled from the last game. Very early release, please show your support by sharing any problems you can see within the game. I am a one man band so it's not easy to do it all alone but i will try my best :) 

2.0.1 Hot fix 08/05/2018

.Reduced lag by decreasing amount of world rendered at a time.

.Fixed the backwards flying whale.

.Slowed down Energy bar depletion.

.Slowed down Food bar depletion.

.Slowed down Water bar depletion.

In upcoming updates i plan to:

. Add more NPC's

. Add a stable quest line

. Change some of the UI layouts

. Add / Remove animations

This is just alpha testing to see if people spot any issues that can be resolved sooner rather than later.

Thanks to:

Sbed - Lightning Bolt
Lorc - Cross & Metal Bar & Vine Whip
Delapouite - Bag & Shower & Water Gallon & Opened Food Can & Bamboo & Drinking & Checklist & Histogram
DarkZaitzev - Fish & Fried Fish
From http://game-icons.net/
Lisa Redfern for water sounds.
Music: https://www.bensound.com
